tab.name: intro
tab.label: Summary
tab.content: Everyone knows the shiny towers of banks and big business that mark the skyline of the City of London, but do you know about the winding medieval alleyways, unexpected old churches and odd memorials that can still be found in the shadow of these buildings? The ancient history of the city is still there to be found, and what better way than on a Treasure Hunt!

tab.name: details
tab.label: Hunt Info
tab.content:
Hunts The pack includes a treasure trail and a bonus round.

Duration 2 hours or so, not including breaks.

Suitability Suitable for any size of group from 1 to 8, good for families. The streets of the city are accessible to all, and any steps can be detoured around. There are two parks to enter but they should be freely accessible in daylight hours.

Requirements Just a pencil and paper, and a sensible pair of shoes.
